channel.title: [FM/RP?] A Game {WIP}
channel.description:
At this current point of time, I have no idea where to categorize this...
So... I will post this here.
THIS IS WORK IN PROGRESS.
I'm planning a small little game. I will need a lot of help on this one. It's based off Fire Emblem. Probably ripping off the gameplay of Fire Emblem, but storywise is unknown.
Shall I make a battle royale? Mmm.... Or should I make a roleplay out of this?
Either way, here's what I want to do. _Create a world where it's represented by grids. You've seen Fire Emblem maps, and they're beautiful. I want to somehow recreate them. Mmm..._ {Currently what I'm doing is using an Excel Sheet and it looks ugly af and friends commented that^}
A good gameplay section. So far the gameplay has been okay {Playtesting} but story sucked soooo much XD. {No control over story} Also, the levelling system when in multiplayer becomes an extreme issue {Know your underlevelled units? Yeah these happen}
A good story. I will die for any good story. I mean I can write one out but it really only happens when I have the time.
Also, which battle system would you use? From which game and why?

item.description:
At this current point of time, I have no idea where to categorize this…

So… I will post this here.

THIS IS WORK IN PROGRESS.

I’m planning a small little game. I will need a lot of help on this one.
It’s based off Fire Emblem. Probably ripping off the gameplay of Fire Emblem, but storywise is unknown.

Shall I make a battle royale? Mmm…
Or should I make a roleplay out of this?

Either way, here’s what I want to do.
Create a world where it’s represented by grids. You’ve seen Fire Emblem maps, and they’re beautiful. I want to somehow recreate them. Mmm… {Currently what I’m doing is using an Excel Sheet and it looks ugly af and friends commented that^}

A good gameplay section. So far the gameplay has been okay {Playtesting} but story sucked soooo much XD. {No control over story}
Also, the levelling system when in multiplayer becomes an extreme issue {Know your underlevelled units? Yeah these happen}

A good story. I will die for any good story. I mean I can write one out but it really only happens when I have the time.

Also, which battle system would you use? From which game and why?
